post.body: Good Luck! x
Yes Think I will go with AA - car is driving me mad!!!!
V Jealous!
Impressed - we are a little Bar Humbug at the Fused office. How is it over at Fazeley Studios? Better than the Greenhouse?
See you in 20.
Spread over the weekend Jon - despite what people think I am not wonderwoman! Although I do admire her style!
Xmas shopping today. Bad idea? Probably - might leave it till late late late
Must do some xmas shopping but not sure 2day is right time. maybe 2night?
Off to Custard Factory xmas party!
Get some Xmas cheer courtesy of the fab Fused Xmas Mix Tape: http://tinyurl.com/4of839
Day started rubbish - car wouldn't start but now its turnd out ACE!!!!! So much good news wohoooooooo.
Car battery is dead again - aghhhhhhhhh!
Anyone have good Car Breakdown Cover they can recommend?
Off to the Creative Republic / Kerrang party later - anyone else?
My last full week of 'work' before xmas - hoping it goes as fast as the previous - can't wait for a break but so much to get done!
Xmas trees up and decorated, kitchen re-painted, essay research to start
Nearly home time - quite a productive afternoon considering i've been in the pub for most of it!
Pub done, mistake on ACE budget corrected, now time for emails and coffee
Is off to the pub for a xmas lunch with Stevie Copter and Dave Fused
Yes it's Friday! Looking forward to putting up the xmas tree tomorrow!
Packing my bags ready for NYE in Stuttgart.
have been avoiding communication but back on today at long last
more shopping to do - booooo
now know what presents to buy - yay!
still got presents to buy - and don't know what to get boooo
